titleStmt.title: By the protector. A proclamation commanding all persons, who have been of the late Kings party, or his sons, to depart out of the cities of London and Westminster and late lines of communication, on or before Thursday the twelfth day of July instant.
Proclamations. 1655-07-06
titleStmt.author: England and Wales. Lord Protector (1653-1658 : O. Cromwell)
Cromwell, Oliver, 1599-1658.

publicationStmt.publisher: printed by Henry Hills and John Field, printers to His Highness,

notesStmt.note: Dated at end: Given at White-hall this 6th day of July, 1655.
Arms 51. Steele notation: persons such 2) Appre- these.
Reproduction of original in the Folger Shakespeare Library.
